description.english: Complete the first mission.

description.spanish: Completa la misión "Roman's Sorrow".
description.russian: Пройдите уровень "Roman's Sorrow".
description.japanese: ミッション"Roman's Sorrow"をクリアする

description.english: Complete mission "Museum Piece".
description.german: Beende die Mission "Museum Piece".

description.spanish: Completa la misión "Museum Piece".
description.russian: Пройдите уровень "Museum Piece".
description.japanese: ミッション"Museum Piece"をクリアする

description.english: Unlock all the islands.
description.german: Schalte alle Inseln frei.
description.french: Débloque toutes les îles.
description.italian: Sblocca tutte le isole.
description.spanish: Desbloquea todas las islas.
description.russian: Откройте все острова.
description.japanese: 全ての島に行けるようになる

description.english: Complete the final mission.
description.german: Beende die letzte Mission.
description.french: Termine la dernière mission.
description.italian: Completa l'ultima missione.
description.spanish: Completa la última misión.
description.russian: Пройдите заключительную миссию.
description.japanese: シングルプレイの最終ミッションをクリアする

description.english: Achieve 100% in "Game progress" statistic.
description.german: Erziele 100% in der Statistik "Spielfortschritt".
description.french: Atteins 100% pour la statistique "Progression".
description.italian: Raggiungi il 100% nei "Progressi di gioco".
description.spanish: Consigue la estadística del 100% en "Progreso del juego".
description.russian: Пройдите игру на 100%.
description.japanese: ゲームの達成率を100%にする

description.english: Successfully date a girl to be invited into her house.
description.german: Verabrede dich mit einem Mädchen und erreiche, dass sie dich zu sich nach Hause einlädt.
description.french: Fais-toi inviter chez une fille pour prendre un dernier verre.
description.italian: Corteggia una ragazza e fatti invitare a casa sua.
description.spanish: Consigue una cita con una chica para que te invite a su casa.
description.russian: Добейтесь, чтобы девушка пригласила вас к себе.
description.japanese: ガールフレンドの家に招待される

description.english: Score 3 strikes in a row, a turkey, in 10-pin bowling.
description.german: Erziele beim Bowling 3 Strikes in Folge.
description.french: Fais 3 strikes consécutifs dans une partie de bowling.
description.italian: Realizza 3 strike di fila a bowling.
description.spanish: Anota 3 plenos seguidos a los bolos.
description.russian: Сделайте 3 страйка подряд в игре в боулинг.
description.japanese: ボウリングでターキー（3回連続ストライク）を達成する

description.english: In a darts game score 180 with 3 darts.
description.german: Erziele beim Darts 180 Punkte mit 3 Pfeilen.
description.french: Marque 180 points avec 3 fléchettes dans une partie.
description.italian: Fai 180 punti con 3 freccette.
description.spanish: En una partida a los dardos, consigue 180 con 3 dardos.
description.russian: Получите 180 очков в дартс с тремя дротиками.
description.japanese: 1回のスローでダーツ3本すべてを20のトリプルにヒットさせる

description.english: Beat the High Score in QUB3D.
description.german: Schlage den Highscore in QUB3D.
description.french: Obtiens le meilleur score à QUB3D.
description.italian: Stabilisci il record di QUB3D.
description.spanish: Supera el récord de QUB3D.
description.russian: Установите рекорд в QUB3D.
description.japanese: QUB3Dのハイスコアで一位になる

displayName.spanish: Le va a costar una pasta

description.english: Complete a taxi ride without skipping from one island to another.
description.german: Absolviere eine Taxifahrt, ohne die Fahrt von einer Insel zur nächsten zu überspringen.
description.french: Termine une course de taxi d'une île à une autre sans passer le trajet.
description.italian: Completa una corsa in taxi da un'isola all'altra senza saltare il viaggio.
description.spanish: Completa una vuelta en taxi sin saltar de una isla a otra.
description.russian: Совершите полноценную поездку на такси с одного острова на другой.
description.japanese: タクシーに乗車しスキップなしで別の島に移動する

description.english: Complete all 10 Exotic Export orders.
description.german: Erledige alle 10 "Exotic Export"-Bestellungen.
description.french: Effectue les 10 commandes d'Exotic Export.
description.italian: Consegna tutti e 10 gli ordini di Exotic Export.
description.spanish: Completa los 10 encargos de "Exotic Exports".
description.russian: Выполните все 10 заказов "Экзотического экспорта".
description.japanese: ブルーシーから頼まれる乗り物10台を全て盗み出す

description.english: Complete all 10 package delivery jobs.
description.german: Erledige alle 10 Paketauslieferjobs.
description.french: Termine les 10 missions de livraison de paquets.
description.italian: Completa tutti e 10 i lavori di consegna.
description.spanish: Completa los 10 encargos de reparto de paquetes.
description.russian: Выполните все 10 заданий по доставке наркотиков.
description.japanese: リトル・ジェイコブから頼まれる小包10個を全て届ける

description.english: Complete the most wanted side missions from the police computer.
description.german: Beende die Polizeicomputer-Nebenmission "Most Wanted".
description.french: Termine les missions de recherche données par l'ordinateur de la police.
description.italian: Completa le missioni del cacciatore di taglie usando il computer della polizia.
description.spanish: Completa las misiones secundarias de "más buscados" del ordenador de la policía.
description.russian: Выполните все "особо опасные" задания из полицейского компьютера.
description.japanese: 警察の端末から開始できる指名手配ミッションをクリアする

displayName.japanese: アサシン グリード

description.english: Complete all 9 assassin missions.
description.german: Beende alle 9 Attentätermissionen.
description.french: Termine les 9 missions d'assassinat.
description.italian: Completa tutte e 9 le missioni da assassino.
description.spanish: Completa las 9 misiones de asesino.
description.russian: Выполните все 9 заданий по киллерству.
description.japanese: 9つの暗殺ミッションを全てクリアする

description.english: Come first in 20 singleplayer street races.
description.german: Beende 20 Singleplayer-Straßenrennen als Erster.
description.french: Termine premier dans 20 courses de rue en solo.
description.italian: Piazzati primo in 20 gare a giocatore singolo.
description.spanish: Llega el primero en 20 carreras callejeras para un jugador.
description.russian: Завоюйте первое место в 20 гонках одиночной игры.
description.japanese: シングルプレイのストリートレースで20回勝利する

description.english: Do a wheelie lasting at least 500 feet on a motorbike.
description.german: Mach einen Wheelie auf einem Motorrad und halte ihn wenigstens 500 Fuß.
description.french: A moto, fais une roue arrière sur plus de 500 pieds (150m).
description.italian: Mantieni un'impennata con la moto per almeno 500 piedi.
description.spanish: Haz un caballito que recorra al menos 152 metros con una moto.
description.russian: Проедьте на заднем колесе мотоцикла минимум 500 футов (153 м).
description.japanese: バイクのウイリーでおよそ160メートルを走破する

description.english: Fly underneath the main bridges in the game that cross water with a helicopter.
description.german: Fliege mit einem Hubschrauber unter den Hauptbrücken des Spiels, die über Wasser führen, hindurch.
description.french: En hélicoptère, passe sous les ponts principaux du jeu.
description.italian: Vola sotto i principali ponti su corsi d'acqua con un elicottero.
description.spanish: Pasa con un helicóptero por debajo de los principales puentes sobre el agua en el juego.
description.russian: Пролетите на вертолете подо всеми ключевыми надводными мостами города.
description.japanese: リバティーシティの主要な橋の下をヘリでくぐり抜ける

description.english: After meeting all possible friends, the ones left alive all like you above 90%.
description.german: Nachdem du alle Freunde kennengelernt hast, liegt die Beliebtheit bei den überlebenden bei über 90%.
description.french: Après avoir rencontré tous les amis possibles, ceux encore en vie t'apprécient à plus de 90%.
description.italian: Dopo aver incontrato tutti i possibili amici, a quelli rimasti vivi devi piacere più del 90%.
description.spanish: Tras conocer a todos los posibles amigos, a los supervivientes les gustas por encima del 90%.
description.russian: Познакомьтесь со всеми возможными друзьями. Те, кто из них жив, обожают вас больше, чем на 90%.
description.japanese: 全ての友達に会い 生存している友達全員の友好度を90%以上にする

description.english: Complete the story missions in less than 30 hours.
description.german: Absolviere die Story in weniger als 30 Stunden.
description.french: Termine les missions de l'histoire en moins de 30 heures.
description.italian: Completa le missioni della storia in meno di 30 ore.
description.spanish: Completa las misiones de la historia en menos de 30 horas.
description.russian: Пройдите основную сюжетную линию меньше, чем за 30 часов.
description.japanese: シングルプレイを30時間以内にクリアする

description.english: Do 5 car rolls in a row from one crash.
description.german: Überschlage dich nach einem einzigen Unfall 5-mal nacheinander mit deinem Auto.
description.french: Effectue 5 tonneaux d'affilée lors d'un seul accident.
description.italian: Fai ribaltare la tua auto 5 volte di fila in un unico incidente.
description.spanish: Da 5 vueltas de campana con tu coche con un solo choque.
description.russian: Перевернитесь в воздухе 5 раз, находясь в машине.
description.japanese: 一回のクラッシュで車を5回転させる

displayName.french: De là-haut, je vois ma maison

description.english: Fly on all helicopter tours of Liberty City.
description.german: Absolviere alle Helikoptertouren in Liberty City.
description.french: Prends part à toutes les visites en hélicoptère de Liberty City.
description.italian: Partecipa a tutti i tour in elicottero su Liberty City.
description.spanish: Haz todos los tours en helicóptero de Liberty City.
description.russian: Побывайте на всех экскурсионных вертолетных турах Либерти-Сити.
description.japanese: 全てのヘリツアーに参加する

description.english: Beat a friend at pool.
description.german: Schlage einen Freund beim Pool.
description.french: Bats un ami au billard.
description.italian: Batti un amico a biliardo.
description.spanish: Derrota a un amigo al billar.
description.russian: Выиграйте у друга в пул.
description.japanese: ビリヤードで友達に勝利する

description.english: Survive 5 minutes on 6 star wanted level.
description.german: Überlebe 5 Minuten lang mit 6 Fahndungssternen.
description.french: Survis pendant 5 minutes avec un indice de recherche de 6 étoiles.
description.italian: Sopravvivi per 5 minuti con 6 stelle di livello di sospetto.
description.spanish: Sobrevive 5 minutos con un nivel de búsqueda de 6 estrellas.
description.russian: Выживите в течение 5 минут при 6-м уровне розыска.
description.japanese: 手配度6の状態で5分間生き延びる

description.english: Complete mission "I'll Take Her".

description.russian: Пройдите уровень "That Special Someone".
description.japanese: ミッション"That Special Someone"をクリアする

description.english: Capture 20 criminals through the police computer.
description.german: Schnappe mithilfe des Polizeicomputers 20 Verbrecher.
description.french: Capture 20 criminels grâce à l'ordinateur de la police.
description.italian: Cattura 20 criminali tramite il computer della polizia.
description.spanish: Captura a 20 criminales a través del ordenador de la policía.
description.russian: Захватите 20 преступников из полицейского компьютера.
description.japanese: 警察の端末から開始できる犯罪者を仕留めるミッションを20回クリアする

description.english: Deliver all 30 cars ordered through text message.
description.german: Liefere alle 30 per SMS bestellten Wagen.
description.french: Livre les 30 voitures commandées par SMS.
description.italian: Consegna tutte e 30 le auto ordinate tramite messaggi.
description.spanish: Entrega los 30 coches solicitados mediante mensajes de texto.
description.russian: Выполните все 30 доставок машин из заданий по SMS.
description.japanese: スティービーから携帯メールで注文された車30台を全て届ける

description.english: Meet all random characters.
description.german: Triff alle Zufallscharaktere.
description.french: Rencontre tous les personnages aléatoires.
description.italian: Incontra tutti i personaggi casuali.
description.spanish: Conoce a todos los personajes aleatorios.
description.russian: Повстречайтесь со всеми случайными персонажами.
description.japanese: 街にいる全てのサブキャラクターに会う

displayName.french: Vlad et Niko sont sur un bateau

description.english: Complete the mission "Uncle Vlad".
description.german: Beende die Mission "Uncle Vlad".

description.spanish: Completa la misión "Uncle Vlad".
description.russian: Пройдите уровень "Uncle Vlad".
description.japanese: ミッション"Uncle Vlad"をクリアする

description.english: Unlock the special ability of phoning for a bomb to be placed.
description.german: Schalte die Spezialfähigkeit frei, eine Bombe per Telefon zu bestellen.
description.french: Débloque la compétence spéciale permettant de poser une bombe en un coup de fil.
description.italian: Sblocca l'abilità speciale di piazzare una bomba via telefono.
description.spanish: Desbloquea la habilidad especial de pedir que se coloque una bomba por teléfono.
description.russian: Откройте особую способность по установке на машины взрывчатки.
description.japanese: パッキーに爆弾を設置させる特殊技能を解除する

displayName.japanese: ドライビングMr.ベリック

description.english: Unlock the special ability of taxi.
description.german: Spiele die Spezialfähigkeit Taxi frei.
description.french: Débloque la capacité spéciale permettant d'appeler un taxi.
description.italian: Sblocca l'abilità speciale di chiamare un taxi.
description.spanish: Desbloquea la habilidad especial de taxi.
description.russian: Откройте особую способность по вызову такси.
description.japanese: ローマンにタクシーを要求する特殊技能を解除する

description.english: Unlock the special ability of helicopter.
description.german: Spiele die Spezialfähigkeit Helikopter frei.
description.french: Débloque la capacité spéciale permettant d'appeler un hélicoptère.
description.italian: Sblocca l'abilità speciale di chiamare un elicottero.
description.spanish: Desbloquea la habilidad especial de helicóptero.

description.japanese: ブルーシーにヘリを要求する特殊技能を解除する

description.english: Unlock the special ability of buying guns from a friend.
description.german: Spiele die Spezialfähigkeit frei, Schusswaffen von einem Freund zu kaufen.
description.french: Débloque la capacité spéciale permettant d'acheter des armes à un ami.
description.italian: Sblocca l'abilità speciale di acquistare armi da un amico.
description.spanish: Desbloquea la habilidad especial de comprarle armas a un amigo.
description.russian: Откройте особую способность покупки оружия у друга.
description.japanese: リトル・ジェイコブから武器を購入する特殊技能を解除する

description.english: Reach a balance of $500,000.
description.german: Erreiche eine Bilanz von 500.000 $.
description.french: Amasse 500.000$.
description.italian: Accumula 500.000$.
description.spanish: Consigue una fortuna de 500.000 $.
description.russian: Достигните баланса в $500000.
description.japanese: 所持金を$500,000まで増やす

description.english: You must blow up 10 vehicles in 10 seconds.
description.german: Du musst in 10 Sekunden 10 Fahrzeuge in die Luft jagen.
description.french: Fais exploser 10 véhicules en 10 secondes.
description.italian: Devi far saltare in aria 10 veicoli in 10 secondi.
description.spanish: Debes hacer explotar 10 vehículos en 10 segundos.
description.russian: Уничтожьте 10 транспортных средств в течение 10 секунд.
description.japanese: 10秒以内に10台の乗り物を爆破する

description.english: Complete 10 melee counters in 4 minutes.
description.german: Kontere 10 Nahkampfangriffe in 4 Minuten.
description.french: Contre 10 fois en 4 minutes dans des combats au corps à corps.
description.italian: Esegui 10 contrattacchi in mischia entro 4 minuti.
description.spanish: Completa 10 desafíos cuerpo a cuerpo en 4 minutos.
description.russian: Совершите 10 контратак за 4 минуты.
description.japanese: 近接格闘のカウンターを4分以内に10回成功する

description.english: Complete 100% of the unique stunt jumps.
description.german: Absolviere 100% der Monster-Stunts.
description.french: Termine les cascades uniques à 100%.
description.italian: Completa il 100% delle acrobazie folli.
description.spanish: Completa el 100% de los saltos acrobáticos.
description.russian: Выполните все уникальные прыжки.
description.japanese: 全てのユニーク・スタントジャンプに成功する

description.english: Collect every hidden package in the game.
description.german: Sammle alle im Spiel versteckten Päckchen.
description.french: Récupère tous les paquets cachés dans le jeu.
description.italian: Recupera tutti i pacchetti nascosti.
description.spanish: Consigue todos los paquetes ocultos del juego.
description.russian: Найдите все спрятанные объекты в игре.
description.japanese: 鳥インフルエンザのハトを全て駆除する

description.english: Lose a 4 star wanted rating by outrunning the cops.
description.german: Werde einen 4-Sterne-Fahndungslevel los, indem du die Cops abhängst.
description.french: Perds un indice de recherche de 4 étoiles en semant les flics.
description.italian: Azzera le 4 stelle di livello di sospetto sfuggendo alla polizia.
description.spanish: Pierde un nivel de búsqueda de 4 estrellas dejando atrás a los polis.
description.russian: Скройтесь от розыска 4-й степени.
description.japanese: 手配度4を消すことに成功する

description.english: Help Billy get his bike back. (The Lost and Damned)
description.german: Hilf Billy, sein Bike zurückzubekommen. (The Lost and Damned)
description.french: Aider Billy à retrouver sa moto. (The Lost and Damned)
description.italian: Aiuta Billy a recuperare la sua moto. (The Lost and Damned)
description.spanish: Ayuda a Billy a recuperar su moto (The Lost and Damned).
description.russian: Помогите Билли вернуть его байк. (The Lost and Damned)
description.japanese: ビリーがバイクを取り戻す手助けをする（The Lost and Damned）

description.english: Become leader of The Lost. (The Lost and Damned)
description.german: Werde Anführer der Lost. (The Lost and Damned)
description.french: Devenir président des Lost. (The Lost and Damned)
description.italian: Diventa il capo dei Lost. (The Lost and Damned)
description.spanish: Conviértete en el jefe de los Lost (The Lost and Damned).
description.russian: Станьте вожаком Пропащих. (The Lost and Damned)
description.japanese: ロストのリーダーになる（The Lost and Damned）

description.english: Finish the story. (The Lost and Damned)
description.german: Schließe die Story ab. (The Lost and Damned)
description.french: Terminer l'histoire principale. (The Lost and Damned)
description.italian: Finisci la storia. (The Lost and Damned)
description.spanish: Acaba la historia (The Lost and Damned).
description.russian: Пройдите сюжетную часть игры. (The Lost and Damned)
description.japanese: 「The Lost and Damned」のストリーモードをクリアする

displayName.japanese: TLAD：ジャストミートを狙え

description.english: In the bike races, whack off 69 bikers with a bat. (The Lost and Damned)
description.german: Schlage bei Rennen 69 Biker mit einem Baseballschläger vom Bike. (The Lost and Damned)
description.french: Lors des courses de motos, dégager 69 motards à l'aide d'une batte. (The Lost and Damned)
description.italian: Durante le gare in moto disarciona a mazzate 69 biker. (The Lost and Damned)
description.spanish: En las carreras de motos, golpea a 69 moteros con un bate (The Lost and Damned).
description.russian: В гонках на мотоциклах оприходуйте бейсбольной битой 69 байкеров. (The Lost and Damned)
description.japanese: バイクレース中にバットで69人のバイカーを叩き落とす（The Lost and Damned）

description.german: Bring Terrys und Clays Härte auf 100%. (The Lost and Damned)

description.spanish: Aumenta la veteranía de Terry y Clay a 100% (The Lost and Damned).
description.russian: Доведите крутость Терри и Клэя до 100%. (The Lost and Damned)
description.japanese: テリーとクレイのタフネスを100％にする（The Lost and Damned）

displayName.italian: TBoGT: Con i piedi per terra

description.german: Schließe alle Basejumps ab. (The Ballad of Gay Tony)
description.french: Réussir tous les base jumps. (The Ballad of Gay Tony)

description.japanese: すべてのベースジャンプを達成する（The Ballad of Gay Tony）
